clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment With Bempedoic Acid And/Or Its Fixed-dose Combination With Ezetimibe in Routine Clinical Practice in Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia Or Mixed Dyslipidemia
clinical_study.official_title: Non-Interventional Study On The Treatment With Bempedoic Acid And/Or Its Fixed-dose Combination With Ezetimibe in Routine Clinical Practice in Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia Or Mixed Dyslipidemia

lead_sponsor.agency: Daiichi Sankyo Europe, GmbH, a Daiichi Sankyo Company

brief_summary.textblock:
Cardiovascular disease (CVD), especially its management and associated costs, remains a major concern globally. There is a direct correlation between circulating levels of low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) and the incidence of CVD.
This study will assess bempedoic acid/FDC in a real-world clinical setting in adult patients in Spain with hypercholesterolaemia or mixed dyslipidemia.

detailed_description.textblock: This non-interventional study will be conducted in order to further understand the potential risks and benefits of bempedoic acid/fixed dose combination (FDC) with ezetimibe in a real-world clinical setting in adult patients with primary hypercholesterolaemia (heterozygous familial and non-familial) or mixed dyslipidaemia and to gain insight into the effectiveness (managing plasma levels of LDL-C) as well as safety (clinical events associated with the treatment modalities). No study medication will be provided as part of this protocol to the patients. Medications will be as prescribed by the treating physician in line with clinical practice.

primary_outcome.measure: Summary of Patient Characteristics in Participants With Primary Hypercholesterolaemia or Mixed Dyslipidaemia Following Treatment With Bempedoic Acid And/Or Its Fixed-dose Combination With Ezetimibe

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Systematic Coronary Risk Estimation (SCORE) System Following Treatment With Bempedoic Acid And/Or Its Fixed-dose Combination With Ezetimibe
Mean Change From Baseline in Second Manifestations of Arterial Disease (SMART) Score Following Treatment With Bempedoic Acid And/Or Its Fixed-dose Combination With Ezetimibe
Mean Change From Baseline in Framingham Risk Score Following Treatment With Bempedoic Acid And/Or Its Fixed-dose Combination With Ezetimibe
Mean Change From Baseline in Low-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Levels
Mean Change From Baseline in Atherosclerotic Cardiovascular Disease-Modifying Cholesterol Fragments Levels
Mean Change From Baseline in Inflammatory Marker hsCRP Levels
Mean Change From Baseline In Uric Acid Levels
Number of Participants With Relevant Cardiovascular (CV) Events
Number of Participants With Adverse Effects and Adverse Drug Reactions Associated With Bempedoic Acid/FDC Ezetimibe
Types of Practitioners Caring for Patients Treated With Bempedoic acid/ FDC with Ezetimibe
Number of Participants Who Reported Use of Lipid-modifying Treatments Prior To Or Concomitantly To Receiving Bempedoic Acid/FDC With Ezetimibe
Mean Dosage of Bempedoic Acid/FDC Treatment
Mean Length of Prescription Intervals of Bempedoic Acid/FDC Treatment
Number of Participants Who Permanently Discontinued or Switched From Bempedoic Acid/FDC Treatment
Healthcare Resource Use In Participants Who Were Treated With Bempedoic Acid/FDC With Ezetimibe Treatment
Mean Change From Baseline In EuroQol (EQ-5D-5L) and PAM-13

arm_group.arm_group_label: Bempedoic acid and/or fixed-dose combination with ezetimibe
arm_group.description: Participants with primary hypercholesterolemia or mixed dyslipidemia who received bempedoic acid and/or its fixed-dose combination with ezetimibe.

intervention.intervention_name: Bempedoic acid and/or its fixed dose combination with ezetimibe
intervention.description: This is a non-interventional study. No study medication will be provided as part of this protocol to the patients. Medications will be as prescribed by the treating physician in line with clinical practice.
intervention.arm_group_label: Bempedoic acid and/or fixed-dose combination with ezetimibe

study_pop.textblock: The study population consists of participants treated or intended to be treated with bempedoic acid/ FDC under usual clinical practice conditions and as long as the decision of the physician to start treatment is prior to the inclusion of the patient in the study under no reimbursement conditions (Part 1) or under reimbursed conditions (Part 2) at enrollment and who are unable to reach their LDL-C goals with the maximum tolerated dose of statins or patients who are determined by their treating physician to be statin intolerant.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Written informed consent to participate
- At least 18 years of age
- Participants suffering from documented primary hypercholesterolemia or mixed dyslipidemia
- Part 1: For participants treated to a maximum of 6 months or intended to be treated with bempedoic acid/FDC under usual clinical practice conditions and as long as the decision of the physician to start treatment is prior to the inclusion of the participant in the study at the discretion of the physician under no reimbursement conditions at enrollment
- Part 2: For participants treated or intended to be treated with bempedoic acid/FDC under usual clinical practice conditions and as long as the decision of the physician to start treatment is prior to the inclusion of the patient in the study under reimbursed conditions at enrollment
- No contraindications exist according to the SmPC of bempedoic acid/ FDC
- No concurrent participation in an interventional study (Simultaneous participation in other non-interventional studies is possible)
- Life expectancy > 1 -year
Exclusion Criteria:
- As this is a non-interventional study, no explicit exclusion criteria exist in order to avoid selection bias and to allow for documentation of routine clinical practice.

overall_contact.last_name: Daiichi Sankyo Contact for Clinical Trial Information

clinical_study.keyword: Bempedoic acid and/or its fixed-dose combination with ezetimibe
